codes:
N,M=list(map(int,input().split()))
l=list(map(int,input().split()))
v=list(map(int,input().split()))
l.insert(0,0)
l.append(0)
b=[]
b.append((M,0,0))
for i in range(1,N+1):
	b.append((M,i,i))
b.sort()
mi=0
ma=-1
for i in range(len(b)-1):
	if(b[i][1]+l[i+1]<v[i]):
		mi=i
		ma=-1
		break
if(mi+1!=len(b)):
	print(-1)
else:
	print(mi+1)
